Description: We are hiring Operations Managers for one of our clients in Doha.Candidates who have the required qualifications and good experience may apply.Skills
Skills:
Minimum 15 years of overall experience with 7 years experience of managing comparable complex high-value operations in the GCC region.
Masters/bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering or Electrical Engineering.
UPDA – Grade A preferred, QCDD is a plus.
A valid Qatar driver’s license is a must
Fluency in English and Arabic is a must.
Arabic nationality
Male candidates are required.
Age: 45 years old and below
With a transferable visa and valid QID/NOC
Residing in Qatar
